name: api_physics_ConfigurableJoint
description: The configurable joint is an extremely flexible joint giving you complete control over rotation and linear motion.

properties.name: angularXDrive
properties.description: Definition of how the joint's rotation will behave around its local X axis. Only used if Rotation Dr

properties.name: angularXLimitSpring
properties.description: The configuration of the spring attached to the angular X limit of the joint.

properties.name: angularXMotion
properties.description: Allow rotation around the X axis to be Free, completely Locked, or Limited according to Low and High

properties.name: angularYLimit
properties.description: Boundary defining rotation restriction, based on delta from original rotation.

properties.name: angularYMotion
properties.description: Allow rotation around the Y axis to be Free, completely Locked, or Limited according to Angular YLim

properties.name: angularYZDrive
properties.description: Definition of how the joint's rotation will behave around its local Y and Z axes. Only used if Rotat

properties.name: angularYZLimitSpring
properties.description: The configuration of the spring attached to the angular Y and angular Z limits of the joint.

properties.name: angularZLimit
properties.description: Boundary defining rotation restriction, based on delta from original rotation.

properties.name: angularZMotion
properties.description: Allow rotation around the Z axis to be Free, completely Locked, or Limited according to Angular ZLim

properties.name: configuredInWorldSpace
properties.description: If enabled, all Target values will be calculated in world space instead of the object's local space.

properties.name: highAngularXLimit
properties.description: Boundary defining upper rotation restriction, based on delta from original rotation.

properties.name: linearLimit
properties.description: Boundary defining movement restriction, based on distance from the joint's origin.

properties.name: linearLimitSpring
properties.description: The configuration of the spring attached to the linear limit of the joint.

properties.name: lowAngularXLimit
properties.description: Boundary defining lower rotation restriction, based on delta from original rotation.

properties.name: projectionAngle
properties.description: Set the angular tolerance threshold (in degrees) for projection.If the joint deviates by more than t

properties.name: projectionDistance
properties.description: Set the linear tolerance threshold for projection.If the joint separates by more than this distance

properties.name: projectionMode
properties.description: Brings violated constraints back into alignment even when the solver fails. Projection is not a phys

properties.name: rotationDriveMode
properties.description: Control the object's rotation with either X & YZ or Slerp Drive by itself.

properties.name: secondaryAxis
properties.description: The joint's secondary axis.

properties.name: slerpDrive
properties.description: Definition of how the joint's rotation will behave around all local axes. Only used if Rotation Driv
